query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS bookmarks (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  transmissionId INT NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_user_transmission (userId, transmissionId),
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (transmissionId) REFERENCES transmissions(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user wNC9iRD8C1xiHd7.root --database FcrG9xDq3HfnDm7AEi3SdN --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS bookmarks (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  transmissionId INT NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_user_transmission (userId, transmissionId),
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (transmissionId) REFERENCES transmissions(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);
